title: G10 Instance
description: The G10 instance defines how an application using G10 will operate

name.title: name
name.description: The instance name is used internally to identify the instance

input.title: input
input.description: Input is a named set of binds. Strings are read as file paths. Objects are read as input json objects. See input schema.

window width.title: window width
window width.description: The width of the window in pixels

window height.title: window height
window height.description: The height of the window in pixels

cache part count.title: cache part count
cache part count.description: Specifies how many parts can be cached at a time. Uncached parts must be (re)loaded from the disk.

cache material count.title: cache material count
cache material count.description: Specifies how many materials can be cached at a time. Uncached materials must be (re)loaded from the disk.

cache shader count.title: cache shader count
cache shader count.description: Specifies how many shaders can be cached at a time. Uncached shaders must be (re)loaded from the disk.

initial scene.title: initial scene
initial scene.description: Specifies The first scene to load from the disk

network bandwidth.title: network bandwidth
network bandwidth.description: Specifies maximum network traffic in kb/s

loading thread count.title: loading thread count
loading thread count.description: Specifies how many threads are used to load a scene
